input_text:
Job Title: Manager, Medicare Sales

Location: Bronx, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
You could be the one who changes everything for our 28 million members. Centene is transforming the health of our communities, one person at a time. As a diversified, national organization, you’ll have access to competitive benefits including a fresh perspective on workplace flexibility.

Position Purpose Manage Medicare sales and business for assigned markets.

Prospect, appoint and manage relationships to achieve production and profitability objectives for assigned marketsManage sales activities for assigned markets and ensure Medicare product performance is consistent with the corporation’s business and Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) regulatory requirementsProvide functional and technical support regarding Medicare product requirementsDevelop and implement plans to identify root causes and actions necessary to resolve identified operational issuesFacilitate development of various reporting tools to monitor operational functions and identify opportunities for improved performance, including development and analysis of reportsMaintain current knowledge of CMS requirements for various sales functions to facilitate identification of requirements for development and assure compliant business operations

Education/Experience Bachelor’s degree in Healthcare, Business Administration, related field, or equivalent experience. 5+ years of sales operations, project management, or business analysis experience within the Medicare field.

Licenses/Certifications Current state’s driver license. State Accident and Health Insurance Agent License.Pay Range $67,400.00 - $121,300.00 per year

Centene offers a comprehensive benefits package including competitive pay, health insurance, 401K and stock purchase plans, tuition reimbursement, paid time off plus holidays, and a flexible approach to work with remote, hybrid, field or office work schedules. Actual pay will be adjusted based on an individual's skills, experience, education, and other job-related factors permitted by law. Total compensation may also include additional forms of incentives.

Centene is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity, and values the ways in which we are different. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, or other characteristic protected by applicable law.

Experience Level (if available): None

Maintain current knowledge of CMS requirements for various sales functions to facilitate identification of requirements for development and assure compliant business operations
